short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick reference tool for Dungeons & Dragons 5th edition

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oracle 5E let's you look up Dungeon and Dragons rules and information such as spells and monsters, providing you with a list of detailed information in seconds. Stop flipping through rule books and complicated sites and let Oracle 5E get you info instantly!
